Comments_Questions: Please rate and comment on the following aspects of your experience in this course or module regarding: Workload  (amount of time required to prepare, in relation to the subject area and content)
Please comment on all aspects of your experience in this course or module regarding: Organization.Comments:
Please comment on all aspects of your experience in this course or module regarding: the Instructor.Comments:
Please comment on: Visitors, if any (evaluate the contribution to the course of each visitor, by name)
Please comment on all aspects of your experience in this course or module regarding: Your Learning.Comments:
Comments_List: I really liked the class. It really gave the students a very good insight what managing a theater would look like and I think for drama students it is crucial class to understand the managing people aspect more.

I think the structure of the class was amazing!
The one thing that could be improved is to use the canvas to upload and grade assignments (it would make things a little easier).

I dont know if it is a B-school thing but the uploading assignments to canvas make things easier and allows you to see all the grading in one interface instead of having to handle the paper.

Other than this all the documents very easy available and more and most important the structure of the class was very very good!
Very well-organized, always knew the agenda for the course and what was happening on a given class day. Changes were communicated promptly.
I think the instructor was the most positiv thing about the class. She has very good intuition and the assignments and cases for the class were very well picked!

Vicki is highly engaged with her students in class and uses discussions to really dig into a topic (as opposed to moving through a list of scripted questions or cutting off conversations in order to keep to a script). She is accessible outside of class and offers positive, valuable feedback to her students. I greatly enjoyed having her as an instructor this semester.
I enjoyed having class with Jason and Jeff Hermann. I also enjoyed class with the lawyer. I found that really fascinating.
Emily Donahue was AWESOME. Please keep bringing her back.
I feel like I have a great grasp on how to read handbooks and the importance of 360 review processes. Those are the things I will take with me during my career.
I got what I was looking for out of this course and will absolutely use what I learned this semester and in my future career.
I would have loved a section where students could bring Vicki managing people questions. Either things we dealt with at previous jobs or questions we had about experiences we might encounter.
Some extra resources for framing the cases could be helpful to assist people from different employment backgrounds understand some of the nuisances within the legalities of situations.
